Articles.Content:
I spent several hours building a ground base on minmus to mine ore and proccess it. It now explodes spontaneously when reloaded. I first discovered this when I flew my next mission in to land with more building supplies. I have tried using the alt+f12 cheats to stop it blowing up to no success. Can anyone help me please? I've already had to replay at least 40 hours of gameplay to get back to this point after my save corrupted. If I can't recover this I'm going to rage quit so hard

I have KIS and KAS installed and that's it.

If you need any files or images or anything let me know.
